com.acmerobotics.dashboard.config

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acmerobotics.dashboard.config.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that manages configuration variables (i.e., options).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Configuration()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addOptionsFromClass(java.lang.Class<?> klass)
      Adds fields from a class as options.
      com.google.gson.JsonElement getJson()
      Returns the configuration and option values encoded in JSON.
      com.google.gson.JsonElement getJsonSchema()
      Returns the configuration schema and option types encoded in JSON.
      void updateJson(com.google.gson.JsonElement json)
      Uses the provided JSON to update the option values.

      • getJsonSchema

        public com.google.gson.JsonElement getJsonSchema()
